mapper.insert: insert into app.user (openid, session_key, avatarUrl, nickName) values (#{openid}, #{session_key}, #{avatarUrl}, #{nickName})
mapper.select: select nickName, avatarUrl, option_backColor_R, option_backColor_G, option_backColor_B, option_backColor_A, option_correct_BackColor_R, option_correct_BackColor_G, option_correct_BackColor_B, option_correct_BackColor_A, deep_checklist_text_font_size, option_style from app.user where openid = #{openid}
mapper.update: update user set deep_checklist_text_font_size=#{deepChecklistTextFontSize}, option_style=#{optionStyle}, option_backColor_R=#{optionBackColorR}, option_backColor_G=#{optionBackColorG}, option_backColor_B=#{optionBackColorB}, option_backColor_A=#{optionBackColorA}, option_correct_BackColor_R=#{optionCorrectBackColorR}, option_correct_BackColor_G=#{optionCorrectBackColorG}, option_correct_BackColor_B=#{optionCorrectBackColorB}, option_correct_BackColor_A=#{optionCorrectBackColorA} where openid = #{openid}
